newsitem.title: USA: Ross April same-store sales rise 10 pct.
newsitem.headline: Ross April same-store sales rise 10 pct.

text.p: Ross Stores Inc on Thursday reported same store sales for the four weeks ended May 3, rose 10 percent over year ago levels.
Total store sales amounted to $142 million, an 18 percent increase over the $120 million in sales for the four weeks ended May 4, 1996, the company said in a statement.
Comparable store sales for the company's fiscal first quarter ended May 3, rose 11 percent as compared to a 14 percent gain in the same period one year ago.
First quarter total sales rose to $443 million, a 19 percent gain from $371 million one year ago.
